yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.pla: Play Embark On A New Journey
Play The First Ray Of Sunshine
Play A Feeling Like Never Before
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.max: Maximum Altitude where pulling up will occur. Note: The true flying maximum altitude may be 60 or 70 blocks more than this. It is recommended to keep this number over 100 blocks above terrain level
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.ant: This Utility will automatically stop elytra flight and attempt to turn if there is an obstacle ahead. It only works in Automatic Flight Mode. Please note that the utility is not foolproof; it is best to not completely rely on it.
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.do_: This module will automatically attempt to land the player when the player has arrived at the destination set in the Autopilot.
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.rec: This feature will automatically save data of your last flight. You can get this data by running the command /flightanalytics
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.aut: Automatically prints analytics after every flight without having to run /flightanalytics
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.pla: Plays some music while automatic flight is active. Just for fun! There will be a few main music tracks that will play on repeat, if you don't like some of them, you can disable them below.
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.x_c: The coordinates of where the HUD should appear on the screen. A coordinate of 0 means leftmost
yacl3.config.automatic-elytra:config.y_c: The coordinates of where the HUD should appear on the screen. A coordinate of 0 means upmost
text.elytraautoflight.title: Automatic Infinite Elytra
